## Summary
Describe the change and the motivation.

## Type of change
- [ ] feat (new feature)
- [ ] fix (bug fix)
- [ ] refactor (no functional change)
- [ ] docs (documentation only)
- [ ] chore (build, tooling, deps)

## Changes
- [ ] UI changes include before/after screenshots
- [ ] Updated docs in docs/ if needed
- [ ] Env/config changes documented (e.g., new VITE_* vars)

## Checklist
- [ ] Ran 
pm run lint with no errors
- [ ] Built locally: 
pm run build
- [ ] Verified 
pm run preview loads without CSP/PWA errors
- [ ] No secrets or dist/ committed
